TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HamburgerMenu extends Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.ContentControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The HamburgerMenu will be removed in a future major release. Please use the NavigationView control available in the Fall Creators Update")

Docs.summary: The HamburgerMenu is based on a SplitView control. By default it contains a HamburgerButton and a ListView to display menu items.
